shri lanka rajaya hadisi nithiya iwath kirimata katayuthu kirima sambandhawa indiya rajaya ada(26) siya prasadaya palakara athi bawa wides madhya wartha sandahan karayi. emenma siwil yuda gatum pawathi kala simawa thula manawa himikam kadawime chodana sambandhawa winiwidabhawayakin yukthawa wimarshana katayuthu sidukirima sambandhawa da indiyawa awadharanaya kara thibe. namuth shri lankawa samaga pawathina mithrathwaya bindadamime awashyathawayak nowana bawath, awathan wu janathawa nawatha padinchi kirime katayuthu sandaha rajaya sahaya dakwima sidukarana bawath indiya widesha amathya es. em. krishna mahatha prakasha kara atha. hadisi nithiya iwathkirimata piyawara ganna bawa eeye(25) parlimenthuwedi wishesha prakashayak sidukaramin shri lanka janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha sandahan kaleya.

eda naya aran yuddhaya nima kala wagema meda naya aran rata sanwardhana karana wita ape wipakshayata dara ganna bari eershyawak athiwanawa yayi aarthika katayuthu pilibanda niyojya amathi lakshman yapa abewardhana mahatha prakasha kaleya.ee mahatha ee adahas prakasha kale halawatha mathiwarana bala pradeshaye shri lanka nidahas paksha kantha sammelanaya halawatha sharli koraya gunanusmarana shalawe di pasugiya 19 da pawathi awasthawediya.thawaduratath adahas dakwu niyojya amathiwaraya meseda kiya.diwayina pura pihiti shri lanka nidahas paksha kantha samithi prathisanwidhana karamin eewa panaganwan lesata janadhipathithuma dun niyogayak anuwa me wana wita apa rata wata yamin ema sanwidhana prathisanwidhana karanawa.

warimarga ha jala kalamanakarana amathyanshaye lekam ayiwan da silwa mahatha pawasana paridi mehidi pradhana lesa kerenne uma oya ha ehi pradhana athu oyak wana mahathotilla oya haraha pradhana weli dekak banda jalasha dekak idikirimayi.mema weli dekin wishalama wella idikaranne walimada nagarayata kilomitara 4 - 5 k durakin pihiti puhulpola pradeshayen aarukku hadayakin mema wella idiwe.piwisum umaga idiwemineya walimada pradeshiya lekam kotase pihiti umaoye shakhawak wana dalgolla oya haraskaramin puhulpola pradeshaye enaminma idiwana jalashayaki.
